content: शाखा {@--1@} A branch (as of a tree); आवज्र्य शाखाः <ls>R. 16. 19.</ls> {@--2@} An arm. {@--3@} A party, section, faction. {@--4@} A part of subdivision of a work. {@--5@} A school, branch, sect. {@--6@} A part or division of an animal. {@--7@} A school or traditional recension of the Veda, the traditional text followed by a school; as in शाकलशाखा, आश्वलायनशाखा, बाष्कलशाखा &c.
